amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds made available in the bill by 1 percent except for specified accounts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds made available in the bill by 1 percent except for specified accounts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 256 (Roll no. 421).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
